    question => string (454) "<p>1. Does the permanent file include relevant information on the scheme, in...
    $value[0]['question']
    <p>1.	Does the permanent file include relevant information on the scheme, including copies of:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The Scheme Rules;</li>
    <li>The Trust Deed;</li>
    <li>Scheme Financial Statements;</li>
    <li>Actuarial valuations;</li>
    <li>The letter of engagement between the entity and the actuary regarding the valuation; and</li>4
    <li>Details of how the actuary assures themselves the information they use is relevant?</li>
</ul>

    question => string (371) "<p>2. Does the assignment plan at Ac14 document the following:</p> <ul> <li>...
    $value[1]['question']
    <p>2.	Does the assignment plan at Ac14 document the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The audit team has adequate knowledge;</li>
    <li>The type of scheme;</li>
    <li>The types of audit evidence to be obtained to support the pension scheme assets and actuarial liabilities;</li>
    <li>The timetable agreed between the actuary and pension scheme auditors?</li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (576) "<p>5. <i>f the scheme is audited by the same A.E.P. as the entity,</i>I has ...
    $value[4]['question']
    <p>5.	<i>f the scheme is audited by the same A.E.P. as the entity,</i>I has a memo been prepared noting the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>That the A.E.P. is the same for both the scheme and client;</li>
    <li>Whether the scheme’s audit report was qualified or not; </li>
    <li>That the subsequent event review on the scheme has been updated to the date of the client’s audit report;</li>
    <li>A synopsis of key issues; and</li>
    <li>A review of the pension scheme materiality and client materiality regarding the pension scheme asset / liability?</li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (695) "<p><i>6. If the scheme has been audited by the same firm but not the same A....
    $value[5]['question']
    <p><i>6.	If the scheme has been audited by the same firm but not the same A.E.P. as the client</i>, has a memo been prepared noting the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>That the A.E.P. is not the same for both the scheme and client;</li>
    <li>Whether the scheme’s audit report was qualified or not; </li>
    <li>That the subsequent event review on the scheme has been updated to the date of the client’s audit report;</li>
    <li>A synopsis of key issues and details of the extent to which the A.E.P. has reviewed the pension scheme file; and</li>
    <li>A review of the pension scheme materiality and the client materiality regarding the pension scheme asset / liability?</li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (392) "<p><i>7. If the scheme is audited by a different firm of auditors:</i></p> <...
    $value[6]['question']
    <p><i>7.	If the scheme is audited by a different firm of auditors:</i></p>
<ul>
    <li>The scheme auditor’s working papers should preferably be reviewed annually to establish the quality of the work; alternatively if this is not possible:</li>
    <li>The working papers should be reviewed every few years to assess quality and send out a questionnaire in the interim years.</li>
</ul>

    question => string (358) "<p><i>8. If the client and pension scheme period ends are not co-terminus:</...
    $value[7]['question']
    <p><i>8.	If the client and pension scheme period ends are not co-terminus:</i></p>
<ul>
    <li>Have either interim audited financial statements been obtained or has adequate audit evidence been obtained for significant movements in the pension scheme asset / liability from the reporting date of the scheme to the reporting date of the client?</li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (1897) "<p><i>9. Review of the actuarial liability:</i></p> <ul> <li>Has the objecti...
    $value[8]['question']
    <p><i>9.	Review of the actuarial liability:</i></p>
<ul>
    <li>Has the objectivity and independence of the actuary been assessed;</li>
    <li>Have the terms of engagement been reviewed for any potential limitation of scope;</li>
    <li>Is the actuary a member of a recognised professional body of actuaries.</li>
    <li>Has the actuary been informed in writing that their work is going to be used as audit evidence?</li>
    <li>Have historic changes in actuarial assumptions been reviewed and has there been a history of errors (i.e. inappropriate mortality rates would be an error, whereas, changing mortality rates as a result of mortality tables being updated would not be)?</li>
    <li>
        <p>Have the following key assumptions been reviewed:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Mortality rates (appropriateness to the scheme);</li>
            <li>Inflation (in light of government statistics);</li>
            <li>Rate of wage increase (using historic rises and the client’s budgets);</li>
            <li>Rate of pension increase (in relation to any indexation requirements in the scheme rules); and</li>
            <li>Rate of discounting (is it based on a good quality corporate bond rate?).</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>If a wide range of options has been provided to those charged with governance ensure that flexing has been appropriately undertaken.</li>
    <li>
        <p>Review the source data used by the actuary and note the controls the actuary uses to ensure that it is accurate. The following constitute key data:</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Membership statistics</li>
            <li>Ages of members</li>
            <li>Length of service</li>
            <li>Gender</li>
            <li>Salaries</li>
            <li>Earnings history</li>
            <li>Employee contributions etc.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (1358) "<p><i>10. Consider the reasonableness of and re-calculate the figures provid...
    $value[9]['question']
    <p><i>10.	Consider the reasonableness of and re-calculate the figures         provided by the actuary:</i></p>
<ul>
    <li>Agree the level of contributions to the scheme’s financial statements and schedule of contributions</li>
    <li>Review current service costs recognised in profit or loss in light of previous periods and changes in payroll</li>
    <li>Past service costs / curtailments etc. recognised in profit or loss.  Review the scheme’s documentation to get an understanding of what has occurred</li>
    <li>Check the calculation of the net interest charge. This can be done by apply the discounting rate to the brought forward net pension scheme asset (whether recognised or not) / liability and to the contributions received during the period and the benefits paid out during the period;</li>
    <li>
        <p>The re-measurement of the net pension scheme liability or asset to fair value in other comprehensive income, the main elements to be understood will be:-</p>
        <ul>
            <li>Actuarial gains and losses;</li>
            <li>The difference between the actual return on scheme assets and crudely the brought forward value of assets multiplied by the discounting rate; and</li>
            <li>Changes resulting from the level of recoverability of a net scheme asset.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>
